title: Strictly Come Dancing's Janette Manrara's horror over wardrobe malfunction
text:
The video will start in 8 Cancel

Get the biggest Strictly Come Dancing stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Strictly Come Dancing professional Janette Manrara was left horrified after she was shown a clip where she exposed her knickers during the weekend's live show.

The dancer, 35, who is paired up with Will Bayley, 31, on the 2019 series of Strictly, fell victim to a wardrobe malfunction during their performance of a contemporary routine to 7 years by Lukas Graham - which left her showing off more than she bargained for.

As Paralympic table tennis player Will lifted the American beauty for an epic lift, on Saturday night's show, her pink dress became caught on his head which meant she flashed her underwear.

The brunette was forced to watch the awkward moment as she and Will appeared on Strictly's spin-off It Takes Two on Wednesday night.

After host Rylan Clark-Neal showed her the footage, the red-faced performer said: "I didn’t know it happened on the night!"

(Image: BBC)

"I remember because I said to him, ‘No matter what happens, when we get to that last lift, you stand steady and you walk forward with power and strength,’ and he did exactly that."

Will added: "It went over my head and I was like, ‘How am I going to style this out?’"

Rylan joked: "All those weeks of training, that’s what it’s paid off for."

(Image: BBC)

(Image: BBC)

Last weekend, Will and Janette scooped up their highest score yet with 32 points.

David James has become the fourth celebrity to leave Strictly Come Dancing 2019.

The former footballer and his professional partner Nadiya Bychkova were sent home in a unanimous decision by the judges.

(Image: BBC)

After discovering his fate, David gave a heartfelt message to fellow celeb Will, who reduced half the judges and most of the audiences to tears with his moving routine.

The pair found themselves at the bottom of the leaderboard after failing to impress with their Jive to 'Such a Night' by Michael Bublé on Saturday night.

They lost out to BBC Breakfast star Mike Bushell and his partner Katya Jones, who gave a stronger performance in the dreaded dance-off.
description: The professional dancer was left cringing when she was forced to watch her knicker-flashing scenes on Strictly's spin-off It Takes Two
